title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) at the same time.
